articles.title: Sainz sets pace on Day 2 of pre-season testing - F1 - The Official Home of Formula 1® Racing
articles.description: Carlos Sainz set the pace on the second day of pre-season testing at the Bahrain International Circuit, as the Spaniard improved on his Ferrari team mate Charles Leclerc’s morning benchmark as the sun started to set in the desert.

articles.author: Matt Kew
articles.title: How Horner handled his first official F1 media duties amid Red Bull probe - Motorsport.com
articles.description: Christian Horner declined to comment on allegations made against him by a female employee during his first official Formula 1 press conference since Red Bull launched its investigation.
articles.content:
The wider Red Bull GmbH company has launched a probe into Horner and he has faced lengthy questioning by an independent barrister who was appointed to draw evidence of the unspecified allegations.
